title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4231.7 - Liability for cost of inquiry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4231.7 - Liability for cost of inquiry

State Regulations

All costs and expenses in relation to determining an
objection or conducting an inquiry shall be paid by such person or persons and
in such proportions as the judges shall direct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4231.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
